      • findAndUseToolCard

        public boolean findAndUseToolCard(int i,
                                  Player player,
                                  Match match)
        allows a player to use a toolcard
        Parameters:
        i - is tool card number
        player - is the player that wants to use the toolcard
        match - is the current match
        Returns:
        true is the toolcard is available and used by the player, false otherwise.
